function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper ventilation in built environments","Impact":"Increased risk of airborne disease transmission","Mitigation":"Implementing proper ventilation systems and air filtration","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers","People":"Building occupants, visitors","Owner":"Building owners, facility managers"},{"Description":"Poor hygiene and sanitation practices","Impact":"Spread of disease through contact with contaminated surfaces","Mitigation":"Regular cleaning, disinfection, and hygiene promotion","Technologies":"Cleaning supplies, disinfectants, hand hygiene stations","People":"Building occupants, cleaning staff","Owner":"Building owners, cleaning companies"},{"Description":"Overcrowding in indoor spaces","Impact":"Higher likelihood of disease spread in crowded areas","Mitigation":"Limiting occupancy, spacing arrangements, and crowd management","Technologies":"Occupancy monitoring systems, crowd tracking technology","People":"Building occupants, event organizers","Owner":"Building managers, event organizers"}]}
